message.content:
cs.CL, cs.CV, cs.MM, cs.IR, cs.LG. 

This paper is about generating natural language descriptions for videos, which involves both computer vision and natural language processing. Therefore, cs.CL (Computation and Language) and cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) are the most likely sub-categories. Additionally, the paper also mentions unsupervised topic mining and speech modality, which could fall under cs.MM (Multimedia) and cs.IR (Information Retrieval). Finally, the paper proposes a novel caption model, which could be considered as a machine learning algorithm, thus cs.LG (Machine Learning) is also a possible sub-category.
